Package application.managers

Class ProductsManager

java.lang.Object
application.managers.ProductsManager
public class ProductsManager extends Object
This class deals with the management of products for sale.
Author:
Federico Canali

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ProductsManager getInstance()
      The constructor is called only if the static instance is null, so only the first time that the getInstance() method is invoked. All the other times the same instance object is returned.
      Returns:
      the instance object is returned.

    • filterSearch

      public List<Product> filterSearch(String maxPrice, String minPrice, String productName, String producerName)
      Used to filter the product search.
      Parameters:
      maxPrice - is the maximum price to search.
      minPrice - is the minimum price to search.
      productName - is the product's name to search.
      producerName - is the producer's name to search.
      Returns:
      returns the list of products filtered.

    • buySomeProducts

      public boolean buySomeProducts(int productCode, int productQuantity)
      This method is used to buy and ship products.
      Parameters:
      productCode - is the product's code to buy.
      productQuantity - is the product's quantity to buy.
      Returns:
      If true then the operation was successful, false otherwise.

      Returns:
      If true then the operation was successful, false otherwise.

      price - is the product's price of new product.
